name: THE LAST SCAPE
description:
Glide through a breathtaking alpine scape in the search of an answer as to why this is your only memory.

THE LAST SCAPE can be played with gamepad or simply with the mouse, the controls are easy for a comfortable experience. The game can be enjoyed by anyone regardless of their age.

For this unique soul simulator, LIDAR laser scan data is used in its raw point cloud form, rendering millions of points in real-time from a dataset of more than one billion 3D points that accurately depict the real world.
